OfflineDreamento module

Copyright (c) 2021-2022 Mahdad Jafarzadeh Esfahani, Amir Hossein Daraie

OfflineDreamento: The post-processing Dreamento!

class OfflineDreamento.OfflineDreamento(master)

Bases: object

Apply_button()

Start the processing, once all the parameters are set.

Parameters

self – access the attributes and methods of the class

Returns display

The main post-processing Dreamento window, saving options

AssignMarkersToRecordedData_EEG_TFR(data, data_R, sf, path_to_json_markers, EMG_path, markers_to_show=['light', 'manual', 'sound'], win_sec=30, fmin=0.3, fmax=40, trimperc=5, cmap='RdBu_r', add_colorbar=False)

The main function: create the main display window of Offline Dreamento

Parameters

  • self – access the attributes and methods of the class

  • data – EEG L data

  • data_R – EEG R data

  • sf – sampling frequency

  • path_to_json_markers – path to the annotation file (generated by Dreamento)

  • EMG_path – path to the EMG file

  • markers_to_show – the desired type of markers to show [‘light’, ‘manual’, ‘sound’]

  • win_sec – the window size to compute spectrogram

  • fmin – relavant min frequency for spectrogram

  • fmax – relavant max frequency for spectrogram

  • trimperc – bidirectional trim factor for normalizing the spectrogram colormap

  • cmap – colormap of the spectrogram

  • add_colorbar – adding colorbar to spectrogram

Returns

fig, markers_details

butter_bandpass_filter(data, lowcut, highcut, fs, order=2)

Butterworth bandpass filter

Parameters

  • self – access the attributes and methods of the class

  • data – data to be filtered

  • lowcut – the lowcut of the filter

  • highcut – the highcut of the filter

  • fs – sampling frequency

  • order – filter order

Returns

y

calculate_lag(plot=False, path_EDF=None, path_Txt=None, T=30, t_start_sync=5, t_end_sync=7)

Calculate the lag between the HDRecorder and Dreamento and compensate it.

Parameters

  • self – access the attributes and methods of the class

  • plot – activate/deactivate plotting

  • path_EDF – path to HDRecorder EEG L.edf file

  • path_Txt – path to Dreamento .txt file

  • T – The duration to use for synchronization (seconds)

  • t_start_sync – the start time of a nevent for sync.

  • t_end_sync – the end point of a nevent for sync.

Returns

samples_before_begin, sigHDRecorder_org_synced, sigScript_org, sigScript_org_R fwsd

Parameters

pan_nav(event)

The keyboard controller of the software

Parameters

  • self – accessing the attributes and methods of the class

  • button (right arrow keyboard) – increase the EEG amplitude scale

  • button – lower the EEG amplitude scale

  • button – navigate to the previous epoch

  • button – navigate to the next epoch

plot_welch_periodogram(data, sf=256, win_size=4, log_power=False)

Plot the welch periodogram

Parameters

  • self – access the attributes and methods of the class

  • data – EEG data

  • sf – sampoling frequency

  • win_size – the size of sliding windows for Welch method.

  • log_power – compute logarithmic power

Returns

plot

save_path_finder()

Button to define the directory to save the .mat output

Parameters

global where_to_save_path

save_results_button(data_EEG_L, data_EEG_R, markers, marker_keys, Hypnodyne_EEG_L, microphone_data, acc_x, acc_y, acc_z, samples_to_sync, raw_EMG1, raw_EMG2, raw_EMG3)

The command to save the results of the ra and processed data to a matfile.

Parameters

  • self – access the attributes and methods of the class

  • data_EEG_L – Dreamento EEG L

  • data_EEG_R – Dreamento EEG R

  • Hypnodyne_EEG_L – HDRecorder EEG L

  • markers – List of annotations

  • marker_keys – The keys to define the dictionaries of annotations

  • samples_to_sync – The number of samples to be compensated for sync.

  • microphone_data – mic recording from the headband

  • acc_x – The x-axis of accleration

  • acc_y – The y-axis of accleration

  • acc_z – The z-axis of accleration

  • raw_EMG1 – The first recorded EMG channel

  • raw_EMG2 – The second recorded EMG channel

  • raw_EMG3 – The third recorded EMG channel

Returns

matfile.mat
